segments.text: What kind of jobs are becoming popular in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As in many countries , there ’ s been a big growth in anything related to computers . Young people are attracted to that field in particular . There ’ s also been a big growth in education .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s been a growth in that field in my country too . A lot of people want to learn practical and professional skills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The interesting thing is that many of the teachers are not actually trained teachers . They are usually professionals who are taking a break from their jobs to pass on skills to others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I noticed that too . What are the people learning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In my country , they are usually studying something business-related , such as marketing , management techniques , and human resource management .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that jobs in the leisure industry will become more popular in the future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That trend has already begun in my country . In particular , there ’ s a big demand for people to work in fitness centers . Which kinds of jobs are less in demand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those in traditional fields , such as agriculture and heavy industry . Younger people are not interested in doing those jobs and other countries have industries that can produce things much cheaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My country is certainly expanding in the service and hi-tech sectors , but contracting in the heavy industry and primary industry sectors . However , our car and aircraft manufacturers are doing very well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are well known for high quality , that ’ s why .
segments.speaker: S1
